import React,{useState,useEffect,useContext} from 'react' import NavbarHome from './NavbarHome' import Conversation from './Conversation' import Message from './Message' import ChatOnline from './ChatOnline' import './messenger.css' import { Button } from '@material-ui/core' import { Context } from '../context/Context' import axios from 'axios' const Messenger = () => { const [conversations, setconversations] = useState([]) const [currChat, setCurrChat] = useState(null) const [messages, setMessages] = useState([]) const { user, dispatch } = useContext(Context); useEffect(() => { const getconversation = async() => { try { const conver = await axios.get(`/conversation/${user._id}`) // console.log(conver) // console.log(user) setconversations(conver.data) } catch (err) { console.log(err.Message) } } getconversation() }, []) return ( <>
{conversations.map((e)=>( ))}
{ currChat ? <>
: Start the conversation }
) } export default Messenger
